body:
Hi Katsuya and Abraham, This is the second encoding error that I see today.

Katsuya, what is the default language that you use on your system and is changing to EN solves the issue?

Also can you send me the results folder so I can check the results .csv file?

Thanks,

Mostapha

Maybe we should change from reading ASCII files if it causes issue for many users: ([http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9942594/unicodeencodeerror-ascii...](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9942594/unicodeencodeerror-ascii-codec-cant-encode-character-u-xa0-in-position-20))
